paragraph-1: Backend and Full Stack Developer with more than 4 years of experience in creating custom and high impact technology solutions. Specialized in developing payment automation systems, banking integrations, custom CRMs, web and mobile applications. With extensive experience in technologies such as Node.js, Express.js, Nest.js, React.js, Next.js, MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and AWS.
paragraph-2: Bachelor in Business Administration with a solid self-taught background in web and mobile development. Passionate about software architecture, process automation and the implementation of good development practices.
